title: How Has The Coronavirus Impacted The Cigar Industry
itunes:title: How Has The Coronavirus Impacted The Cigar Industry
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… How has the Coronavirus impacted the Cigar Industry? Who are the winners and who are the losers? Who will survive and who won’t? We will break it down as we light up Abuelo from The Cigar Authority Care Package in the first hour.

In the second hour smoke a Juarez from Crowned Heads that is also from the Care Package as we continue the discussion in the second hour as we welcome Michael Cappellini from Toscano Cigars as he updates us on our friends from Italy. You’ve also heard us joke around about Dave getting a hair cut from a Flowbee. Well he’s going to prove it is no joke by giving himself a haircut during one of the breaks.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
